attributes.action: EU Referendum Result to be Dismissed or Re-arranged due to Manipulation of Facts
attributes.additional_details: Also that the referendum should not have been called (or should have been delayed) as the issue was too complex for members of public with no experience or skills in politics should have been expected to make this decision. The PM is not legally obliged to adhere with the outcome until the treaty is invoked.
attributes.background: The Lisbon treaty should not be invoked as the referrendum was not democratic and based on propaganda, manipulation and Xenophobia and acknowledging the outcome would legitimise this behaviour.
